movies.title: Over and Out
movies.plot: Two women bond in a hospital after having recently given birth.

movies.title: Duck Soup
movies.plot: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side th...

movies.title: Operation Amsterdam
movies.plot: When Germany invades Holland in 1940, a British intelligence officer and two Dutch diamond merchants go to Amsterdam to persuade the Dutch diamond merchants to evacuate their diamond supplies to England.

movies.title: A Midnight Clear
movies.plot: The Ardennes Forest, December 1944. A squad of six US infantrymen is sent to occupy a house to use as an observation post as the German Army is expected to advance through that area. However, the Germans seem oddly friendly.

movies.title: Attack
movies.plot: In 1944, an American Infantry company sets up an artillery observation post, but tensions between Captain Cooney and Lieutenant Costa run high.

movies.title: Troy
movies.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces.

movies.title: Ronin
movies.plot: A freelancing former U.S. intelligence agent tries to track down a mysterious package that's wanted by both the Irish and the Russian governments.

movies.title: In the Army Now
movies.plot: Two misguided youths join the reserves to make some money for their entrepreneurial dreams. No sooner than they finish basic training are they called up to do their part to save the free world.

movies.title: Battleship Potemkin
movies.plot: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

movies.title: Age of Heroes
movies.plot: The true story of the formation of Ian Fleming's 30 Commando unit, a precursor for the elite forces in the U.K.

movies.title: Exodus
movies.plot: The State of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

movies.title: Overlord
movies.plot: A small group of American soldiers find horror behind enemy lines on the eve of D-Day.

movies.title: The Sea Wolves
movies.plot: During World War II, British Intelligence brings a crew of ex-soldiers out of retirement, using their age as cover, to take to the seas and pull off an unlikely undercover mission in neutral Goa.

movies.title: The Secret Invasion
movies.plot: In 1943, a group of hardened criminals is pardoned on the condition it accepts a mission to free a captive Italian general from the clutches of the Nazis.

movies.title: The Devil's Own
movies.plot: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.

movies.title: Thirteen Days
movies.plot: In October 1962, the Kennedy administration struggles to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis.

movies.title: Dune
movies.plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

movies.title: Flight of the Intruder
movies.plot: During the air war over Vietnam, a U.S. Navy A-6 Intruder bomber pilot schemes with a hardened veteran to make an unauthorized air strike on Hanoi.

movies.title: Jakob the Liar
movies.plot: During World War II, an ordinary inhabitant of a ghetto fakes news about Allied offensives to inspire hope for other victims of the Nazi regime.

movies.title: Lone Survivor
movies.plot: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

movies.title: Dead Presidents
movies.plot: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

movies.title: Path to War
movies.plot: In the mid 1960s, President Lyndon B. Johnson (Sir Michael Gambon) and his foreign-policy team debate the decision to withdraw from or escalate the war in Vietnam.

movies.title: Syriana
movies.plot: A politically charged epic about the state of the oil industry in the hands of those personally involved in and affected by it.

movies.title: Mulan
movies.plot: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

movies.title: Greyhound
movies.plot: Several months after the U.S. entry into World War II, an inexperienced U.S. Navy commander must lead an Allied convoy being stalked by a German submarine wolf pack.

movies.title: WarGames
movies.plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

movies.title: The Great Raid
movies.plot: Taking place towards the end of WWII, 500 American Soldiers have been entrapped in a camp for 3 years. Beginning to give up hope they will ever be rescued, a group of Rangers goes on a dangerous mission to try and save them.

movies.title: WarGames
movies.plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

movies.title: WarGames
movies.plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

movies.title: The Admiral: Roaring Currents
movies.plot: Admiral Yi Sun-sin faces a tough challenge when he is forced to defend his nation with just 13 battleships against 300 Japanese enemy ships in the Battle of Myeongryang.

movies.title: Good Kill
movies.plot: A family man begins to question the ethics of his job as a drone pilot.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: In Which We Serve
movies.plot: This "story of a ship", the British destroyer H.M.S. Torrin, is told in flashbacks by survivors as they cling to a life raft.

movies.title: Independence Day
movies.plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

movies.title: Carter's Army
movies.plot: A racist officer is put in charge of a squad of black troops charged with taking an important bridge from the Germans.

movies.title: Da 5 Bloods
movies.plot: Four black veterans battle the forces of man and nature when they return to Vietnam seeking the remains of their fallen squad leader and the gold fortune he helped them hide.

movies.title: Operation Pacific
movies.plot: During WWII, a submarine's second in command inherits the problem of torpedoes that don't explode. When on shore, he is eager to win back his ex-wife.

movies.title: Megan Leavey
movies.plot: Based on the true life story of a young Marine corporal whose unique discipline and bond with her military combat dog saved many lives during their deployment in Iraq.

movies.title: Their Finest
movies.plot: A former secretary, newly appointed as a scriptwriter for propaganda films, joins the cast and crew of a major production while the Blitz rages around them.

movies.title: The Final Countdown
movies.plot: A modern aircraft carrier is thrown back in time to 1941 near Hawaii, just hours before the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

movies.title: The Night of the Generals
movies.plot: In 1942, a Polish prostitute and German Agent is murdered in Warsaw. Suspicion falls on three Generals, and Major Grau of German Intelligence seeks justice which ends up taking decades.

movies.title: Fixed Bayonets!
movies.plot: The story of a platoon during the Korean War. One by one Corporal Denno's superiors are killed until it comes to the point where he must try to take command responsibility.

movies.title: The Steel Helmet
movies.plot: A ragtag group of American stragglers battles against superior Communist troops in an abandoned Buddhist temple during the Korean War.

movies.title: Patriot Games
movies.plot: When CIA analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

movies.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
movies.plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

movies.title: Cross of Iron
movies.plot: German commander Hauptmann Stransky places a squad in extreme danger after Sergeant Rolf Steiner refuses to lie for him.

movies.title: Black Hawk Down
movies.plot: The story of one hundred and sixty elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed...

movies.title: The Guns of Navarone
movies.plot: A team of Allied saboteurs is assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held Greek island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.

movies.title: The Adventures of Gerard
movies.plot: Based on satirical short stories by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle about a vain, egotistical Etienne Gerard, a French brigadier serving during the Napoleonic Wars. He thinks he's the best soldier and lover that ever lived and intends to p...

movies.title: War of the Worlds
movies.plot: An alien invasion threatens the future of humanity. The catastrophic nightmare is depicted through the eyes of one American family fighting for survival.

movies.title: Lawrence of Arabia
movies.plot: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.plot: In 1944 Spain, a girl is sent to live with her ruthless stepfather. During the night, she meets a fairy who takes her to an old faun. He tells her she's a princess, but must prove her royalty by surviving three gruesome tasks.

movies.title: War Witch
movies.plot: Somewhere in Sub-Saharan Africa, Komona, a 14-year-old girl, tells her unborn child growing inside her the story of her life since she has been at war. Everything started when she was abducted by the rebel army at the age of 12.

movies.title: Action in the North Atlantic
movies.director: Lloyd Bacon, Byron Haskin, Raoul Walsh
movies.plot: An American tanker is sunk by a German U-boat, and the survivors spend 11 days at sea on a raft. Their next assignment - bound for Murmansk through the sub-stalked N. Atlantic.

movies.title: Outbreak
movies.plot: A team of Army doctors struggle to find a cure for the deadly Motaba virus that was transported from Africa to North America by a white-headed Capuchin monkey and is now spreading quickly throughout a small California town.

movies.title: Gallipoli
movies.plot: Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.

movies.title: The English Patient
movies.plot: At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

movies.title: Air Force
movies.plot: The crew of an Air Force bomber arrives in Pearl Harbor in the aftermath of the Japanese attack on December 7, 1941, and is sent on to Manila to help with the defense of the Philippines.

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

movies.title: Rambo III
movies.plot: Loner Rambo leaves a Buddhist monastery to free his Green Beret mentor from Soviets in Afghanistan.

movies.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
movies.plot: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

movies.title: Stalingrad
movies.plot: A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

movies.title: Behold a Pale Horse
movies.plot: Famous Spanish bandit Artiguez returns to his native Spanish village after 20 years in French exile, but Spanish cop Vinolas sets a trap for him.

movies.title: North West Frontier
movies.plot: Set on the North West Frontier of colonial India in 1905. A British Army Officer, Captain Scott is sent to rescue a five year old Indian Prince and his American governess, Catherine Wyatt from certain death at the hands of rebel t...

movies.title: A Bridge Too Far
movies.plot: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

movies.title: Rocky IV
movies.plot: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-six, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

movies.title: Anthropoid
movies.plot: Based on the extraordinary true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WWII mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

movies.title: Hamburger Hill
movies.plot: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.

movies.title: Tora Tora Tora: The Real Story of Pearl Harbor
movies.plot: An examination of the 1941 air raid on the US naval base.

movies.title: Major Dundee
movies.plot: In 1864, due to frequent Apache raids from Mexico into the U.S., a Union officer decides to illegally cross the border and destroy the Apache, using a mixed army of Union troops, Confederate POWs, civilian mercenaries, and scouts.

movies.title: Alexander
movies.plot: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest army leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

movies.title: Top Secret!
movies.director: Jim Abrahams, David Zucker, Jerry Zucker
movies.plot: An American rock and roll singer is invited to a cultural festival in East Germany in order to distract from a plot to destroy NATO submarines, but he accidentally becomes involved in a resistance plot to rescue an imprisoned scie...

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.plot: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier, transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a warmonger and a terrorist organiza...

movies.title: Lord of War
movies.plot: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

movies.title: Beasts of No Nation
movies.plot: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

movies.title: The Bridge at Remagen
movies.plot: As the Allied armies close in, the Germans decide to blow up the last Rhine bridge, trapping their own men on the wrong side. But will it happen?

movies.title: Eye in the Sky
movies.plot: Col. Katherine Powell, a military officer in command of an operation to capture terrorists in Kenya, sees her mission escalate when a girl enters the kill zone, triggering an international dispute over the implications of modern w...

movies.title: The Sun
movies.plot: Third part in Aleksandr Sokurov's quadrilogy of Power, following Moloch (1999) and Taurus (2001), focuses on Japanese Emperor Hirohito and Japan's defeat in World War II when he is finally confronted by General Douglas MacArthur w...

movies.title: They Were Expendable
movies.plot: A Navy commander fights to prove the battle-worthiness of the PT boat at the start of World War II.

movies.title: Spy Game
movies.plot: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.

movies.title: The Mouse That Roared
movies.plot: An impoverished backward nation declares a war on the United States of America, hoping to lose, but things don't go according to plan.

movies.title: Zero Dark Thirty
movies.plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: The history of the United States from the 1950s to the '70s unfolds from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, who yearns to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: Lebanon
movies.plot: During the First Lebanon War in 1982, a lone tank and a paratroopers platoon are dispatched to search a hostile town.

movies.title: The Big Red One
movies.plot: A hardened sergeant and the four core members of his infantry unit try to survive World War II as they move from battle to battle throughout Europe.

movies.title: Outside the Law
movies.plot: A drama about the Algerian struggle for independence from France after WWII.

movies.title: Hacksaw Ridge
movies.plot: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, serving during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

movies.title: The Patriot
movies.plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

movies.title: The Ottoman Lieutenant
movies.plot: This movie is a love story between an idealistic American nurse and a Turkish officer in World War I.

movies.title: Casualties of War
movies.plot: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself the outsider of his own squad when they unnecessarily kidnap a female villager, for their sexual enjoyment.

movies.title: A Private War
movies.plot: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.

movies.title: The Great Escape
movies.plot: Allied officers in a German prisoner of war camp during World War II make a daring plan for a mass escape by hundreds of POWs hoping to draw German personnel and resources away from combat operations.

movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.plot: In 1936, archaeologist Indiana Jones is tasked by Army Intelligence to help locate a legendary ancient power, the Ark of Covenant, before the Nazis get it first.

movies.title: The Night of the Shooting Stars
movies.plot: In 1944, the residents of a small Italian town under Axis control flee their homes to seek out the liberating Allied forces.

movies.title: Red Cliff
movies.plot: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).

movies.title: The Sum of All Fears
movies.plot: CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to incite a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland.

movies.title: The Hurt Locker
movies.plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

movies.title: The Promise
movies.plot: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, The Promise follows a love triangle between Michael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated Ana, and Chris - a renowned American journalist based in Paris.

movies.title: Come and See
movies.plot: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

movies.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
movies.plot: In the wake of Pearl Harbor, a young lieutenant leaves his expectant wife to volunteer for a secret bombing mission which will take the war to the Japanese homeland.

movies.title: Crash Dive
movies.plot: A submarine lieutenant and his commander fall in love with the same girl.

movies.title: Redbad
movies.plot: The power struggles and wars between the Frisian Redbad and his sworn enemy Pepin of Herstal, Lord of the Franks.

movies.title: The Key
movies.plot: During World War II, successive tugboat British Captains sent on dangerous salvage missions pass-on the key to a home-port apartment, where a lonely Swiss-Italian young war-widow lives.

movies.title: Darkest Hour
movies.plot: In May 1940, the fate of World War II hangs on Winston Churchill, who must decide whether to negotiate with Adolf Hitler, or fight on knowing that it could mean the end of the British Empire.

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.plot: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

movies.title: Battle for Incheon: Operation Chromite
movies.plot: A team of spies is sent into Incheon to gain intelligence on North Korean positions ahead of the invasion by UN forces.

movies.title: Predator
movies.plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

movies.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
movies.plot: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

movies.title: Memphis Belle
movies.plot: In 1943, the crew of a B-17 based in the UK prepares for its 25th and final bombing mission over Germany before returning home to the USA.

movies.title: Edge of Tomorrow
movies.plot: A man fighting in a war against aliens must relive the same day every time he dies until he can find a way to stop their power source with the help of an elite soldier.

movies.title: Triple Frontier
movies.plot: Loyalties are tested when five friends and former special forces operatives reunite to take down a South American drug lord, unleashing a chain of unintended consequences.

movies.title: Commando
movies.plot: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

movies.title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
movies.plot: During World War II, an American navy ship is sunk by a Japanese submarine leaving 890 crewmen stranded in shark infested waters.

movies.title: Green Zone
movies.plot: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.

movies.title: Heaven and Earth
movies.plot: In 16th century Japan, two samurai engage in massive battles across the countryside, one attempting to conquer and the other attempting to defend his land while repressing his love for a woman after taking a vow of celibacy.

movies.title: Conan the Barbarian
movies.plot: A powerful warrior seeks to avenge the genocide of his people and the murder of his parents at the hands of a snake cult.

movies.title: Behind Enemy Lines
movies.plot: A disillusioned navigator, shot down over war-torn Bosnia, goes on the run from the local military as well as an assassin, while his commanding officer risks all to save him.

movies.title: Salvador
movies.plot: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

movies.title: Flags of Our Fathers
movies.plot: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.

movies.title: Letters from Iwo Jima
movies.plot: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

movies.title: Paths of Glory
movies.plot: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

movies.title: RoboCop
movies.plot: In a violent future in Old Detroit, murdered police officer Alex Murphy is resurrected as RoboCop, a powerful cyborg law enforcer. As he fights crime, he begins to recover memories of his past and seeks revenge on the gang who kil...

movies.title: Black Book
movies.plot: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance. Things get complicated when she falls for the enemy.

movies.title: Courage Under Fire
movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

movies.title: Pearl Harbor
movies.plot: A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.

movies.title: Valkyrie
movies.plot: A dramatization of the July 20, 1944 assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Adolf Hitler during World War II.

movies.title: The Deer Hunter
movies.plot: The lives of a group of friends are forever changed by the Vietnam War.

movies.title: Biloxi Blues
movies.plot: A group of young recruits go through boot camp during the Second World War in Biloxi, Mississippi. From the play by Neil Simon.

movies.title: All Quiet on the Western Front
movies.plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

movies.title: Ran
movies.plot: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

movies.title: Downfall
movies.plot: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

movies.title: Von Ryan's Express
movies.plot: An American POW leads a group of mainly British prisoners to escape from the Germans in WWII.

movies.title: U-571
movies.plot: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

movies.title: Sicario
movies.plot: An idealistic FBI agent is enlisted by a government task force to aid in the escalating war against drugs at the border area between the U.S. and Mexico.

movies.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
movies.plot: Haunted by personal demons, Marine Sgt. John Stryker is hated and feared by his men, who see him as a cold-hearted sadist. But when their boots hit the beaches, they begin to understand the reason for Stryker's rigid form of disci...

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.plot: A cyborg from the future, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies.title: Wonder Woman
movies.plot: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

movies.title: Starship Troopers
movies.plot: Humans, in a fascist militaristic future, wage war with giant alien bugs.

movies.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
movies.plot: Rambo returns to the jungles of Vietnam on a mission to infiltrate an enemy base-camp and rescue the American POWs still held captive there.

movies.title: TMR 308: Dr Strangelove (1964) (TMR Movie Dialogue)
movies.plot: N/A

movies.title: Army of Shadows
movies.plot: An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.

movies.title: Kelly's Heroes
movies.plot: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines in WWII France to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

movies.title: Aliens
movies.plot: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth ...

movies.title: Paisan
movies.plot: American military personnel interact warily with a variety of Italian locals over a year and a half in the push north during the Italian Campaign of WWII as German forces make their retreat.

movies.title: The Enemy Below
movies.plot: During WWII an American destroyer discovers a German U-boat, and in the ensuing duel the American captain must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.

movies.title: Platoon
movies.plot: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

movies.title: The Siege
movies.plot: The secret U.S. abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York City, which leads to the declaration of martial-law.

movies.title: Operation Dumbo Drop
movies.plot: To keep the loyalty of a village during the Vietnam war, a U.S. Army officer and his unit struggle to deliver it a live elephant.

movies.title: Mongol: The Rise of Genghis Khan
movies.plot: The story recounts the early life of Genghis Khan who was a slave before going on to conquer half the world in 1206.

movies.title: Paradise Now
movies.plot: Two childhood friends are recruited for a suicide bombing in Tel Aviv.

movies.title: The Last of the Mohicans
movies.plot: Three Mohican trappers agree to protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

movies.title: Apocalypse Now
movies.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

movies.title: The Dirty Dozen
movies.plot: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

movies.title: Clear and Present Danger
movies.plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

movies.title: The African Queen
movies.plot: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

movies.title: From Here to Eternity
movies.plot: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a pugilistic private is cruelly punished for refusing to join his unit's boxing team. Meanwhile, his commanding officer's wife and top NCO are indulging in a torrid love affair.

movies.title: Rescue Dawn
movies.plot: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

movies.title: The Battle of Algiers
movies.plot: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

movies.title: Glory
movies.plot: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

movies.title: Red Dawn
movies.plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

movies.title: Red Dawn
movies.plot: It is the dawn of World War III. In the western mountains of America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

movies.title: Force 10 from Navarone
movies.plot: During World War II, several oddly assorted military experts are teamed in a mission to raid and destroy a bridge vital to enemy strategy.

movies.title: Three Kings
movies.plot: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.

movies.title: Mash
movies.plot: N/A

movies.title: Enemy at the Gates
movies.plot: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

movies.title: Fury
movies.plot: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

movies.title: Fires on the Plain
movies.plot: In the closing days of WWII, remnants of the Japanese army in Leyte are abandoned by their command and face certain death by starvation.
